      • gamesBehind

        public static double gamesBehind(double firstTeamTotal,
                                 double secondTeamTotal)
        This functions takes the first team in the division and calculates the games behind for the teams lower than the team in first (team in first - team below) / 2
        Parameters:
        firstTeamTotal - is the team in firsts total games
        secondTeamTotal - is the team below the team in first total games
        Returns:
        the games behind in a double
